inscription:
Inscribed in black crayon within composition, LC: Kosmos getarnt[?] wit Kosmos
Horizontal line in pencil below image
medium: Oil, black ink, graphite, with stamped or printed image on found image, with collaged elements
portfolio: Mein Schwan: Skizzen zu Einem Buch
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
signed:

Signed and dated in pencil below image, LC: G Multerer / 2001
title: Untitled (Duck on brown square)
